title: How to start your own Bison herd!

subtasks: Purchase bison from a local breeder
Contact National Bison Association for information
Visit nearby bison farms for observation
Acquire necessary facilities like good fencing
Learn from personal experience or prior livestock knowledge
Understand behavioral differences between bison and cattle
Communicate with existing bison farmers for advice

tasks.task: Consider the need for permits or licenses
subtasks: Confirm that no special permits are required for raising bison
